==German== ===Etymology=== {{prefix|de|an|kommen}}. Compare {{cog|nl|aankomen}}, {{cog|en|oncome}}, {{cog|sv|ankomma}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈʔanˌkɔmən/}} * {{audio|de|De-ankommen.ogg|audio (Germany)}} * {{audio|de|De-at-ankommen.ogg|audio (Austria)}} * {{hyphenation|de|an|kom|men}} ===Verb=== {{de-verb-strong|class=4|kommt an|kam an|angekommen|past subjunctive=käme an|auxiliary=sein}} # {{lb|de|intransitive}} to [[arrive]] # {{lb|de|impersonal|with preposition [[auf]]}} to [[depend]] on # {{lb|de|impersonal|with preposition [[auf]]}} to be [[important]], to [[matter]] #* '''2012''' June 12, ''[[w:Die Welt|Die Welt]]'' [http://epaper.apps.welt.de/welt/archiv/], page 22: #*: Bei der Herstellung von Glas '''kommt''' es auf die schnelle Abkühlung der mindestens 1400 Grad heißen Schmelze '''an'''. #*:: In the production of glass, the fast cooling of the at least 1400-degree hot melt is important. ====Conjugation==== {{de-conj-auto|an|kommen|aux=s}} ====Synonyms==== * {{sense|to arrive}} {{l|de|eintreffen}} ====Antonyms==== * {{sense|to depart}} {{l|de|abfahren}}, {{l|de|abreisen}}, {{l|de|weggehen}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|Ankommen}} * {{l|de|ankommend}} * {{l|de|angekommen}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} ---- ==Swedish== ===Etymology=== {{sv-verb-form-pastpart|ankomma}} ===Adjective=== {{head|sv|adjective}} # [[arrived]] #: ''det ännu inte '''ankomna''' tåget'' #:: the not yet arrived train, the train which has not yet arrived #: ''det '''ankomna''' köttet gick inte att äta'' #:: the arrived meat was inedible # {{lb|sv|archaic}} [[drunk]] #: ''en '''ankommen''' man ankom till polisen'' #:: a drunken man arrived to the police # {{lb|sv|archaic}} [[sick]] [[person]] or [[body part]] #: ''armen var svårt '''ankommen''' av yersinia pestis'' #:: the arm was severely affected by [[w:Yersinia pestis|yersinia pestis]] # {{lb|sv|archaic}} severely affected or damaged by [[moisture]] or [[fermentation]]; [[spoiled]], [[rancid]], [[rotten]], [[gone bad]] #: ''det '''ankomna''' köttet gick inte att äta'' #:: the rancid meat was inedible #: ''fönsterkarmen var '''ankommen''''' #:: the window frame had rotted ====Declension==== {{sv-adj-pastpart|2=ankommet|3=ankomne|4=ankomna}}
